entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning near noon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Monday 27 February 2023
